title: Billionaire Broken
description: Stone-Black is on the brink of destruction and Delilah's heart threatens to tear her and Jackson Stone apart. They face a clever foe and their own demons.Will he finally take off his mask and give his heart to her? Or is it truly over between them?This is the eighth and final part of the "Billionaire Boss" series by Emily Cantore and is 7750 words long.
author: Emily Cantore
